author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa has announced solatium to the families of six migrant workers from West Bengal, who succumbed to injuries they had sustained during a boiler blast incident in a tyre-melting unit at Coimbatore on February 11.

In her statement, Ms. Jayalalithaa expressed her condolences to the bereaved families and announced solatium of Rs. one lakh from Chief Minister's Public Relief Fund to each of the six families.
title: Solatium announced
